data.name: The MIR Incident (Alpha Demo) Demo
data.detailed_description:
Hijacked, locked up and reduced to a test subject for a secret laboratory.
Tied to a laboratory bench and at the mercy of the upcoming experiment, the situation looks grim.
However, an uprising of the neurogenetically altered apes offers you a way to escape.
Battles between the test subjects and armed scientists rule the resulting chaos.
There won't be a better chance for you to escape.

It's up to you to cope with this chaos.
  • Find equipment
  • Solve puzzles
  • Discover secrets
  • Craft items
  • Watch out for ambushes
Only then will you be able to survive and escape.


Note:
The full version is scheduled for early 2023.
Requests, ideas and other suggestions are welcome.
It helps us to create a high quality product.

Reporting bugs or improvements is also welcome.
This also helps to improve the product.

The full version contains:
  • Open World
  • 6+ Biomes
  • Hundreds of various equipment items
  • Hundreds of characters
  • Crafting Skills
  • Permanent Companions
  • And more ...
